DataTransferItemList.summary: The DataTransferItemList object is a list of objects representing items being dragged. During a drag operation, each has a property and that property is a DataTransferItemList.

remarks.para: The individual items can be accessed using the bracket notation [].

DataTransferItemList was primarily designed for the HTML Drag and Drop API, and is still specified in the HTML drag-and-drop section, but it is now also used by other APIs, such as and . Documentation of DataTransferItemList will primarily discuss its usage in drag-and-drop operations, and you should refer to the other APIs' documentation for usage of DataTransferItemList in those contexts.
